backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with file, folder, mission, user profile, and authorization logic, including metadata types and CRUD operations with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping new fixes and behaviors to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains concise summaries of key frontend files and their responsibilities in the application.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing the creation of a v114 baseline draft with verification steps and change-control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring metadata, PWA settings, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Freeze notice stating no code changes are allowed post‑restoration until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, and display behavior for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network‑first fetch logic with fallbacks.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the frontend has been fully restored to Live v114 with correct behavior and file integrity.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing theming, providers, and conditional intro display after successful login.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing error details and retry/logout actions for actor initialization failures.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated camera icon with hover effects for visual branding.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom divider line for UI decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot be opened externally, offering retry and download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog component showing previews for various file types with actions like download, delete, and moving files.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file uploads and link creation with validation, progress tracking, and status checks.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI, with disabled and hover states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting folders with swipe actions and validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with navigation, delete, download, share, and folder/move actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a grid of files with selection, previews, long‑press actions, and opening behavior based on file type.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with theme toggle, authentication menu, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays an animated welcome screen that auto-transitions to the main app.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Shows a dialog when a link cannot be opened, allowing retry or copying the URL.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login button for Internet Identity with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission editor handling title, tasks, attachments, and mission updates.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen missions list with creation, deletion, and navigation to mission details.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog listing missions and allowing selected files to be moved to a mission, with loading, error, and pending states.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files into folders or back to the main collection, with folder listing and action handlers.
Swipeable row component exposing edit and delete actions with gesture handling and state control.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Top progress bar showing aggregated upload progress and file count during active uploads.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen describing the app's purpose and providing a login button for onboarding.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization with retries, error classification, and sign-out handling.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking upload batches, per-file progress, totals, and helper methods to manage uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and tracking login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: React hook that detects whether the device uses a coarse (touch) pointer.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating missions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for notes-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark themes, color variables, and global style rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page managing authentication state, backend readiness, data fetching, and UI sections like folders, missions, and uploads.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization error messages and helpers to classify and extract error details.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities to open external URLs and download files via browser APIs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type and exposes helper checks for viewer or download behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type, checks preview support, and generates human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Implements debugging helpers for React Query cache state and mutation lifecycle logging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs backend smoke tests for folder creation, missions, file uploads, and list validations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical list of all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for drift detection and future syncs.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, listing three known bugs related to deletion flows and a link-opening UI error, along with corresponding existing feature entries. Indicates this is a fix request with no new feature proposals.
